description: Search and apply for jobs in Great Britain using ‘Find a job’.

external_related_links.title: Safer Jobs: advice on avoiding job scams
National Careers Service: careers advice and guidance

details.introductory_paragraph:
Find full or part-time jobs in England, Scotland and Wales.

Use the ‘Find a job’ service to search and apply for jobs.

This service has replaced Universal Jobmatch.

This page is also available in Welsh (Cymraeg).

There is a different service to search for jobs in Northern Ireland.
